{"doc":{"info":{"calaisRequestID":"746d036a-3c2c-1076-146f-2322e5a20d48","id":"http://id.opencalais.com/lOEVDz6mONRtdCu7GPaa6g","docId":"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/5ac019ae-1637-3aa7-9aba-437387c4b872","document":" ￼AIJIE, II EOVEXBER A last pibroch In South Queensferry Enough, fourteen-bar compressed & gurgling pibrochs for you, Annie, whoever you were (I mythed you). There are affairs more pressing than love, say they who have it So look around. The bookie'-s satellite disc shines on the new deli; library hours are cut my neighbour's roof leaks into mine (would we were seperate, or one) ... The Chancellor parks his belly on TV, proclaims Auld Scotia is a bag of wind squeezed in History's oxter. Behind my town the fields are burning, it is time to leave. Rush hour. The trucks point Horth and whine the^low-ai {he VMvld \n￼tZisTH MACG-E£ S A Y S Tliis is not passion, but with pleasure I see you note how well I am undressed in black. Clear sight shows our age, lines curved around the mouth like brackets, as though we smile as an aside (as though desire were a little joke we like to tell from time to time). Ve are not in love, we are not drowning in needy dreams, so we may lay down our weary arms, unconfused by fate and feeling; I am composed as we surrender, eyes wide open even as they close. / ","docTitle":"","docDate":"2014-07-01 09:51:53.855"},"meta":{"contentType":"text/raw","emVer":"7.1.1103.5","langIdVer":"DefaultLangId","processingVer":"CalaisJob01","submissionDate":"2014-07-01 09:51:53.434","submitterCode":"57b17a53-6e34-87b0-20ff-a419896f49c9","signature":"digestalg-1|A521rI5Ajk1muRZPz6dajcTxA68=|KQlzQ1Y14IeAZe8CzAUHPzcNTl0OSXxM78TCXpypp/YzuLbtTBERgA==","language":"English"}},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/5ac019ae-1637-3aa7-9aba-437387c4b872/lid/DefaultLangId":{"_typeGroup":"language","language":"http://d.opencalais.com/lid/DefaultLangId/English"},"http://d.opencalais.com/genericHasher-1/0269fe17-3bfb-34e2-aeb5-2521158f5817":{"_typeGroup":"entities","_type":"Position","name":"Chancellor","_typeReference":"http://s.opencalais.com/1/type/em/e/Position","instances":[{"detection":"[into mine (would we were seperate, or one) ... ]The Chancellor[ parks his belly on TV, proclaims Auld Scotia is]","prefix":"into mine (would we were seperate, or one) ...
